reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I was nervous after reading a few negative reviews on this hotel because I had booked it before it opened, but I was pleasantly suprised when we arrived. We had a great stay here.
reviews.title: A nice suprise!

reviews.text: FRONT DESK: english was spoken really well and everyone was very friendly and helpful. The lobby was beautiful. The tour desk lady was very helpful and tours were reasonably priced. There was still some minor construction going on around the outside of the hotel, but nothing that was inconvenient or too noisy.
reviews.title: Overall a good choice.

reviews.text: ROOM: were on the smaller side, but still very comfortable and modern design. The only odd thing was that there wasn't a stand-up shower, only a jacuzzi tub. The bed was quite hard, but we found that was the norm in Asia. Everything was very new and clean.
reviews.title: Grand opening
Nice new hotel with rooms for improvements
Choose another hotel is you want a good nights sleep
Nice and new, great pool, terrible food!

reviews.text: Room service staff - 2 of 5, could not understand 'bucket of ice' or 'ice' for 3 times.
reviews.title: Not ready for business.
